Title: Leave No Trace
Description:
I need to go make sure she's all right. What I saw in that cave... If she's more sensitive to this...

<Hannan nearly growls.>

But she's making a mess out here, drawing attention and leaving a trail leading outsiders right to her! Right to us.

We're supposed to be subtle. Unseen. Keep to the brush, hide in our other forms as much as possible.

I hate to ask this of you, but can you use my scythe to take care of the evidence while I check on her?
ObjectivesText: Collect 10 Magic Traces into Hannan's Scythe.
ObjectivesCompletionText: Reunite with Orweyna in the Maddening Deep.
RewardText:
It's forbidden for me to talk to outsiders, but... you have been helpful.

Thank you for aiding me with this burden.
